paragraphs.body: With the extensive amount of characters featured in this category, doesn't it make sense to place minor characters like the ${link_0} in a different category? I propose making a new category entitled Category:Minor Characters. Entia non sunt multiplicanda praeter necessitatem 22:03, April 29, 2011 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: With the extensive amount of characters featured in this category, doesn't it make sense to place minor characters like the Captured agent in a different category? I propose making a new category entitled Category:Minor Characters. Entia non sunt multiplicanda praeter necessitatem 22:03, April 29, 2011 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: In my book, i would make much sense to split the Non Main Characters of ATLA and TLOK in these two categories: All Other Characters of ALTA and All Other Characters of TLOK... Rava (wall • contribs) 22:07, March 20, 2012 (UTC)
paragraphs.text: In my book, i would make much sense to split the Non Main Characters of ATLA and TLOK in these two categories: All Other Characters of ALTA and All Other Characters of TLOK... Rava (wall • contribs) 22:07, March 20, 2012 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: Does anyone else think it would be a good idea to swap Amon's image on this page from the picture of him as a child in the Water Tribe to a picture of him in the mask, to avoid the chance of accidentally spoiling anyone who hasn't seen the series yet? —Preceding unsigned comment added by Jorlem (wall • contribs) This note was added on 18:33, September 22, 2012 (UTC).
paragraphs.text: Does anyone else think it would be a good idea to swap Amon's image on this page from the picture of him as a child in the Water Tribe to a picture of him in the mask, to avoid the chance of accidentally spoiling anyone who hasn't seen the series yet? —Preceding unsigned comment added by Jorlem (wall • contribs) This note was added on 18:33, September 22, 2012 (UTC).
